title: McGregor vs. Poirier 4 in the Works?
summary: Rumors are swirling about a potential fourth fight between Conor McGregor and Dustin Poirier, with sources suggesting a possible winter showdown.

title: Jones to Defend Heavyweight Title Against Miocic
summary: The highly anticipated heavyweight title clash between Jon Jones and Stipe Miocic has been officially announced for UFC 300.

title: Canelo Alvarez Announces Next Fight
summary: Boxing superstar Canelo Alvarez has confirmed his next opponent will be David Benavidez in a super middleweight unification bout.
